SELECT T1.CHECK_NO ,T1.COL_AVG FROM (
SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CHECK_NO, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM"월"DD"일"') AS CHECK_NO ,ROUND( (B001+B002+B003+B004+B005+B006+B007+B008+B009)/8 , 2) AS COL_AVG FROM BODY_CHECK_LIST WHERE TO_DATE(CHECK_NO, 'YYYYMMDD') >= SYSDATE- (1*9)
SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CHECK_NO, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY"년"WW"주"') AS CHECK_NO ,ROUND( AVG((B001+B002+B003+B004+B005+B006+B007+B008+B009)/8) , 2) AS COL_AVG FROM BODY_CHECK_LIST WHERE TO_DATE(CHECK_NO, 'YYYYMMDD') >= SYSDATE- (7*9) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CHECK_NO, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY"년"WW"주"')
SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CHECK_NO, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY"년"MM"월"') AS CHECK_NO ,ROUND( AVG((B001+B002+B003+B004+B005+B006+B007+B008+B009)/8) , 2) AS COL_AVG FROM BODY_CHECK_LIST WHERE TO_DATE(CHECK_NO, 'YYYYMMDD') >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE , -9 ) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CHECK_NO, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY"년"MM"월"')
) T1 ORDER BY T1.CHECK_NO DESC

SELECT SUM(B001) AS B001 ,SUM(B002) AS B002 ,SUM(B003) AS B003 ,SUM(B004) AS B004 ,SUM(B005) AS B005 ,SUM(B006) AS B006 ,SUM(B007) AS B007 ,SUM(B008) AS B008 ,SUM(B009) AS B009 FROM BODY_CHECK_LIST
WHERE TO_DATE(CHECK_NO, 'YYYYMMDD') >= (SYSDATE - 1*9)
WHERE TO_DATE(CHECK_NO, 'YYYYMMDD') >= (SYSDATE - 7*9)
WHERE TO_DATE(CHECK_NO, 'YYYYMMDD') >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -9)

SELECT SUM(B001) AS B001 ,SUM(B002) AS B002 ,SUM(B003) AS B003 ,SUM(B004) AS B004 ,SUM(B005) AS B005 ,SUM(B006) AS B006 ,SUM(B007) AS B007 ,SUM(B008) AS B008 ,SUM(B009) AS B009 FROM BODY_CHECK_LIST
WHERE CHECK_NO = (SELECT MAX(CHECK_NO) FROM BODY_CHECK_LIST )
WHERE TO_DATE(CHECK_NO, 'YYYYMMDD') >= (SYSDATE - 7*1)
WHERE TO_DATE(CHECK_NO, 'YYYYMMDD') >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)
